_header: More love may no man show
_description: On suffering love — one couplet translating ‘Maiorem caritatem nemo habet, etc.’ (Jn 15.13) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
More loue may no man scheweþan surffren det for loue
                    trewe
NLS18721.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 346 (where treated as part of 3630).
